Summary: VERY BRIGHT WOBBLY STARBURST SHAPE MOVING SE
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chehalis
There were no other sightings in Chehalis on or around August 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting Details2 adults and one child in our back yard enjoying a fire and looking at the night sky. We spotted a very bright light, a starburst shape, that was high in the sky and moving in a SE direction. It was very bright at first. It was moving slowly in an erratic type motion, almost wobbling as it headed SE. We commented that is was definitely not an airplane or a meteor. It started to fade, then was just a spot of light. It turned red and then disappeared. At the same time we saw a meteor shoot across the sky, so it was markedly different than the meteor. The whole event lasted about 30 seconds. We knew we had seen something remarkable and different than we had ever seen.
